prompt: Use case: photorealistic-natural. Asset type: website hero banner for a home and living brand. Primary request: aesthetic exterior/interior transitional view of a sandy cave-style modern house. Scene/background: arid Mediterranean landscape with warm stone textures, sculpted cave-like arches, minimalist furniture visible through open space. Subject: premium architectural home in earthy tones. Style/medium: high-end architectural photography, editorial, natural realism. Composition/framing: ultra-wide horizontal 3:2, clean horizon, generous negative space on right side for headline text overlay. Lighting/mood: soft golden hour sunlight, calm, quiet, premium. Color palette: sand, beige, clay, walnut, warm off-white. Materials/textures: limestone, plaster, wood, linen, stone floor. Constraints: no people, no logos, no text, no watermark.
composition: ultra-wide, negative space on right, premium landing hero
constraints: no people, no logos, no text, no watermark
